name: Yummy Heroes
description:
Match and collect yummy foods in the yummiest match-3 adventure!

The Food Kingdom is now plagued by evil dark forces. Only those smartest heroes could solve the puzzles, collect enough yummy foods and save the kingdom. Danger and fortune co-exist in every corner of the vast jungles, islands and castles. So plan your limited steps carefully, match three foods or more to clear the board and employ those fantastic boosters to help you. It’s your yummy time!

FEATURES:
● Perfectly designed HD graphics and gameplay
● Magic boosters to help you through tough levels
● Free & easy to play, yet challenging to master
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors

Like Hi Studio Games on Facebook!
